# Minor Antagonists
Most, if not all Minor Antagonists are ghost-controlled roles that give dead people new ways to cause chaos around the station. They are spawned through random events.
# Revenant
A Revenant is given powers to haunt the crew and steal life essence from them.
## Essence
- Your [color=#a4885c]essence[/color] is your very own life force, and a way to use abilities for a cost; don't let it drop to zero. - To gain [color=#a4885c]essence[/color], you first inspect various souls for their worth. More worthy souls grant more essence. - However, merely checking their worth isn't enough to collect [color=#a4885c]essence[/color]. You must siphon it either when the victim is critical, dead, or sleeping. - A good start is to go to Medical or Dorms; but be weary, you are vulnerable to attacks when you siphon a soul. Taking damage reduces your [color=#a4885c]essence[/color]! So plan your attacks wisely.
## Shop And Powers
- Using [color=#a4885c]stolen essence[/color] gotten from siphoning souls, you can gain skills for mischief, such as environmental destruction, power grid disruption and electrocution through the shop. - Using powers leave you vulnerable to attacks for some time, so plan ahead and prepare before attacking.
# Rat King
A Rat King is a giant rat capable of setting up a nest and creating rat servants to do their bidding (usually to get food). While rat kings are catagorized as a minor antagonist role, they have no objectives stating they must harm the crew. In reality, one could setup a peaceful coalition between the heads of the station and the Rat King. Do be warned though; as you are not crew, security [italics]absolutely[/italics] has the right to shoot you on sight.
## Abilities
Abilities come at a cost to the Rat King's hunger. Simply eating replenishes it. The three most important of your abilities include:
- Raise an Army of [color=#a4885c]Rat Servants[/color]. - Command your servants to your will; you can make them follow you, attack others, or just roam freely. - Conjure a cloud of miasma, which heals you and your servants.
# Space Dragon
A Space Dragon is a giant dragon that creates space carp rifts and eats the crew. They can either be generated through a random event, brought onto the station from an expedition or a salvage wreck, or can be called in by a [color=#a4885c]Space Ninja[/color].
## Abilities
- Devour critical or dead victims.
- Summon a Carp Rift that periodically spawns [color=#a4885c]Space Carp[/color].
